#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

How to set your configuration.properties file


= Parameters =

inputQueue=The path to the scanned images with subdirectories named same as documentTypes

imageServer.internal=Whether the internal imageserver is used (values: false, true)
[default: false]

imageServer.url=The URL of a imageserver (if is any imageserver used)

imageServer.known=The path to the image server directory where data with known sysno is stored (if is any imageserver used)

imageServer.unknown=The path to image server directory where data with unknown sysno is stored (if is any imageserver used)

djatoka.home=The scan Djatoka home path

editor.home=The editor home path

imageExtension=The allowed image extensions (values: jpg, JPG, png, tiff, tif, jpeg, jp2, pdf) [default: jpg, png, tiff, tif, jpeg]

documentTypes=Types of objects being digitalized (values: monograph, periodical, map, manuscript) [default: periodical, monograph]

guishowInputQueue=Whether the input queue has to be shown(values: false, true) [default: true]

recentlyModifiedNumber=The number of shown recently modified item [default: 10]

z39.50Profile=The z39.50 profile [default: mzk]

z39.50Host=The host(s) of z39.50 providers [default: aleph.mzk.cz, aleph.muni.cz, sigma.nkp.cz, sigma.nkp.cz]

z39.50Port=The used port(s) of z39.50 [default: 9991, 9991, 9909, 9909]

z39.50Base=The z39.50 base(s) [default: MZK01-UTF, MUB01, SKC, NKC]

barcodeLength=The lenght(s) of barcode [default: 10, 10, 10, 10]

oaiUrls=The URL(s) of OAI provider [default: http://oai.mzk.cz]

oaiIdPrefixes=The ID-prefixes of OAI [default: oai:aleph.mzk.cz]

oaiBases=The OAI base(s) [default: MZK01, MZK03]

accessUserPatterns= [default: {{{*}}}]

accessAdminPatterns= [default: 127.{{{*}}}||localhost]

krameriusHost=The kramerius host

krameriusLogin=The kramerius login

krameriusPassword=The kramerius password

fedoraHost=The fedora host

fedoraLogin=The fedora login [default: fedoraAdmin]

fedoraPassword=The fedora password

fedoraVersion=The fedora version [default: 3.3]

httpBasicPass NOT SUPPORTED

dbHost=The database host [default: localhost]

dbPort=The database port [default: 5432]

dbLogin=The database login [default: meditor]

dbPassword=The database password

dbName=The database name [default: meditor]

sshUser=The user for accessing the machine via ssh [default: meditor]

openIdApiKey=The openId API key (of Janrain service) [default: 775a3d3ec29deeeaf39e506ff514f39fcb5e434d]

openIdApiUrl=The openId API URL (of Janrain service) [default: https://rpxnow.com]

localhost=Whether is this machine for developing (when the application is ran via hosted mode) [default: false]

userDirectories=The path to the stored user copies of FOXML or other user things

genImagesLifetime=The number of days after which will be the generated (converted) images removed

akkaConvertWorkers NOT SUPPORTED

akkaOn NOT SUPPORTED [default: false]

createIngestInfoXmlFile NOT SUPPORTED

imagesDir=The path to the directory where converted images will be stored [default: ~/output/]

identities  NOT SUPPORTED YET
